creator: jtafralian@techempower.com
text:
When a HttpRequest is saved, either specifically or it's parent Thread Group or 
Test Plan, the values in the Name/Value pairs do not save all the time.  This 
does not happen all the time but for every 1 out of 5 HttpRequests.  I am using 
Version 1.7-Beta 3

creator: mstover1@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 5399 ***

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
